name: Wheels of Hope
description:
Wheels of Hope

Great escape story of a brave soldier.

A poisonous deadly virus had spread throughout the city.  Humans who inhaled the toxic air had already turned into monsters. Not only humans but other animals too.

Remaining citizens are evacuated by the special military forces.

This the tale of a military soldier who saved everyone by turning the impossible into  reality.

The name of this game, "Wheels of Hope" has a very special meaning. Hope everyone will find out the reason so soon.
